text: Mashiro is a Japanese name meaning white. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == People == *Mashiro Matsumura *Mashiro Kazahana or Mashiro Blanc de Windbloom, fictional characters in My- HiME and My-Otome *Mashiro, a fictional character in Bleach (manga) *Sakamato Mashiro *Masahiro Fukuda, Japanese association football player *Masahiro Endo, Japanese association football player *Masahiro Ando, Japanese association football player ==References== Category:Given names
title: Mashiro
